name.japanese: バーソロミュー・くま

keyMoments.title: Reveals Nikyu Nikyu no Mi Devil Fruit
keyMoments.description: Kuma reveals that he has eaten the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi (Paw-Paw Fruit), demonstrating his ability to repel anything with the paw pads on his hands, including attacks and air itself.
keyMoments.significance: First full reveal of Kuma's Devil Fruit powers, establishing the mechanics of his nearly invincible defensive and offensive capabilities.
keyMoments.quote: I ate the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi. I'm a Paw Human who can repel anything.

keyMoments.title: Uses Puni Technique
keyMoments.description: Kuma demonstrates the basic application of his Nikyu Nikyu no Mi by repelling Zoro's sword strikes and other physical attacks with his paw pads.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the fundamental defensive capability of his Devil Fruit ability.

keyMoments.title: Debuts Tsuppari Pad Ho
keyMoments.description: Kuma uses Tsuppari Pad Ho, thrusting his paw pads forward in rapid succession as an offensive attack against the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that his Devil Fruit can be used offensively as well as defensively.

keyMoments.title: Creates Compressed Air Bomb
keyMoments.description: Kuma begins compressing massive amounts of air between his paws, repeatedly repelling it to create a small, dense paw-shaped bubble containing enormous destructive power.
keyMoments.significance: Setup for his ultimate attack Ursus Shock, showcasing the true devastating potential of his abilities.

keyMoments.title: Offers Ultimatum to Surrender Luffy
keyMoments.description: Kuma offers to spare the Straw Hats and their allies if they surrender Monkey D. Luffy to the World Government, explaining that the government wants no witnesses to Moria's defeat.
keyMoments.significance: Tests the loyalty of the Straw Hat crew and reveals the World Government's political manipulations.
keyMoments.quote: If you hand over Straw Hat Luffy's head, I can let the rest of you live.

keyMoments.title: Unleashes Ursus Shock
keyMoments.description: After the Straw Hats refuse to surrender Luffy, Kuma releases his compressed air bomb, creating a massive paw-shaped explosion that devastates all of Thriller Bark and knocks out nearly everyone.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most devastating attacks in One Piece up to this point, demonstrating Kuma's overwhelming power and setting up the events of the next episode.

abilities.description: Basic repelling technique using the paw pads to deflect attacks and objects.
Offensive technique where Kuma thrusts his paw pads forward in rapid succession to attack opponents.
Kuma's ultimate technique where he compresses a massive amount of air into a small paw-shaped bubble, which then explodes into a devastating shockwave capable of destroying an entire island.

reveals.information: Possesses the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi (Paw-Paw Fruit), allowing him to repel anything
Tasked by the World Government to eliminate all witnesses to Gecko Moria's defeat

keyMoments.title: Challenges Kuma Despite Exhaustion
keyMoments.description: Despite being exhausted from the battles with Oars and Moria, Zoro steps forward to confront Bartholomew Kuma, attempting to strike him with his swords only to have all attacks effortlessly repelled.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's role as the crew's protector and his willingness to fight even when outmatched, setting up his legendary sacrifice in the next episode.

keyMoments.title: Refuses to Surrender Luffy
keyMoments.description: Zoro, along with the rest of the crew, refuses Kuma's ultimatum to surrender Luffy, choosing potential death over betraying their captain.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the unwavering loyalty of the crew to their captain and sets up Zoro's actions in the following episode.

keyMoments.title: Joins Fight Against Kuma
keyMoments.description: Sanji enters the battle alongside Usopp to help save Zoro and the crew, but their combined attacks prove completely ineffective against Kuma's repelling abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even multiple crew members working together cannot overcome Kuma's overwhelming power.

keyMoments.title: Refuses to Surrender Luffy
keyMoments.description: Sanji refuses Kuma's ultimatum to surrender Luffy, standing with the crew despite facing certain death.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's loyalty to their captain.

keyMoments.title: Underestimates Kuma and is Defeated
keyMoments.description: Franky, underestimating Kuma's abilities, launches an attack against the Warlord but is effortlessly defeated with a single strike from Kuma's paw.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even the physically powerful members of the crew are no match for Kuma in their exhausted state.

keyMoments.title: Joins Fight Against Kuma
keyMoments.description: Usopp enters the battle alongside Sanji to help the crew, but their attacks prove ineffective against Kuma's repelling abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the desperation of the situation as even the typically cautious Usopp must join the hopeless fight.
